cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("consoleapp500")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


set(consoleapp500_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/consoleapp500.jucer"
)


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_VERSION "5.0.0"
  PROJECT_FILE "${consoleapp500_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "lctLWP"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "consoleapp500"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  REPORT_JUCE_APP_USAGE OFF # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN OFF # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  SPLASH_SCREEN_COLOUR "Dark"
  PROJECT_TYPE "Console Application"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.yourcompany.consoleapp500"
  INCLUDE_BINARYDATA ON
)

jucer_project_files("consoleapp500/Source"
# Compile   Xcode     Binary    File
#           Resource  Resource
  x         .         .         "Source/foo.cpp"
)

)

  DEBUG_MODE ON
